attributes.name: Close Combat Ability
attributes.description: Ability to hit or avoid being hit in Close Combat.

attributes.name: Range Combat Ability
attributes.description: Ability to accurately hit a target at range.

attributes.name: Reflexes
attributes.description: Initiative in Combat, for Detecting things, stealth, avoid being hit during Range Combat, and ability to disengage from Close Combat.

attributes.name: Knowledge
attributes.description: Lore, knowledge, memorization, maximum skills, creativity in general.

attributes.name: Presence
attributes.description: Empathy, maturity, influence, emotions, negotiate, leadership, grace, and charisma.

attributes.name: Willpower
attributes.description: Discipline and Morale tests. Resistance to overwhelming emotions. Control oneself.

attributes.name: Strength
attributes.description: Damage bonus for physical attacks, pushing/pulling/throwing/jumping, wrestling, breaking/bending things.

attributes.name: Fortitude
attributes.description: Resist Injury. Resist afflictions such as from poison, bleeding, illness, nausea. Resist sleep. Ability to exceed physical limits.

attributes.name: Move
attributes.description: How fast a character may move during each Combat Turn. Agility. Mobility.

attributes.name: Size
attributes.description: The Index of Weight of the character in pounds on the Universal table.

attributes.name: Zed
attributes.description: Ability to use Magic and general ability to alter probabilities. Also known as “Luck”.
